entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
